content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. I must say, the apartment is in great condition and its location is prime. Now, about the rental price, I'm sure we can find a suitable amount that would be mutually beneficial. Please make me an offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Great, Mister Schmidt. I think a good price for a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center would be around 800 Euro. I am a dependable and responsible tenant, so I would take good care of your apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I appreciate your offer, Yi-Nuo Wang. However, I must inform you that I am in no hurry and I am expecting a better offer. I am sure you understand that as a landlord, my goal is to secure the highest possible rent. Please consider making a higher offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Okay, Mister Schmidt. I understand that you are looking for the highest possible rent. How about 850 Euro? This is a fair price for this type of apartment in the city center. I am willing to sign a long-term lease and I promise to take good care of your apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Thank you for the counteroffer, Yi-Nuo Wang. I am not satisfied with the amount, as I believe the apartment's prime location and its condition justify a higher rent. I am sure you understand that as a landlord, I must consider all offers carefully. Please feel free to make a higher offer if you are still interested.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, Mister Schmidt. Considering the apartment's location and condition, I am willing to pay 900 Euro per month. This is a reasonable price for a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. I am a smart and responsible tenant, so I will take good care of your apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Thank you for the new offer, Yi-Nuo Wang. I appreciate your understanding of the apartment's value. However, I must inform you that I am still not satisfied with the amount. I believe the apartment deserves a higher rent, given its prime location and condition. Please feel free to make a higher offer if you are still interested.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Very well, Mister Schmidt. Here is my final offer. I am willing to pay 950 Euro per month for the apartment. I am a dependable and responsible tenant, so I will take good care of your apartment. I hope this offer meets your expectations.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Thank you for your final offer, Yi-Nuo Wang. I appreciate your understanding of the apartment's value and your commitment to being a responsible tenant. I am satisfied with your offer of 950 Euro per month. I agree to the price of 950 Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [950 Euro]!
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of [950 Euro]!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
